0:
--------------------
Text: Paradisbakkerne ("hills of paradise"), also Helvedesbakkerne ("hills of hell"), is a group of hills in Denmark, located in the east of the island of Bornholm.

Triplets:<Paradisbakkerne
1:
--------------------
Text: Paradisbakkerne:  It is situated approximately 3 km northwest of Nexø.
Triplets:<Paradisbakkerne
4:
--------------------
<Text: Paradisbakkerne:  Midterpilt, 113 m above sea level, is one of the highest points.>
Triplets:<Paradisbakkerne
5:
--------------------
<Text: Paradisbakkerne:  Although much of the area is now wooded, it was once covered with heather and low shrubs, making it suitable for grazing.>
Triplets:<Paradisbakkerne
7:
--------------------
<Text: Paradisbakkerne:  These include Slingestenen, Linkisten, Ligstenen, Dybedal, Ravnedal, Majdal, and Gamle Dam.>
Triplets:<Paradisbakkerne
